descriptionHtml:
All the configs I\'ve seen are horribly oversaturated or undersaturated, ruining the world that Bethesda artists (and modders) have painstakingly crafted.

Behold the glory of Skyrim in a fully-accurate color palate!


******************************************************************************************
Use with the \"Vanilla\" preset of Realistic Lighting 

Please use version 3.4 (NOT 3.4a) to avoid unnatural water bug.

******************************************************************************************

INCOMPATIBILITIES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Imaginator or other color/lighting mods will most certainly break the color balance. As will the mod \"Fixed Eye Adaptation\" 

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: tritonxiv
